text: Christine Margaret Sinclair (born June 12, 1983) is a Canadian football player who plays for the Portland Thorns and the Canada women's national soccer team. She is thought to be one of the best women football players in the world. == Honours == === Club === ==== FC Gold Pride ==== * WPS Championship (1) : 2010 ==== Western New York Flash ==== * WPS Championship (1) : 2011 === International === ==== Canada ==== * CONCACAF Women's Gold Cup (1) : 2010 ==References== Category:1983 births Category:Living people Category:Canadian footballers Category:Olympic bronze medalists for Canada Category:Olympic gold medalists for Canada Category:Female footballers Category:Medalists at the 2012 Summer Olympics Category:Medalists at the 2016 Summer Olympics Category:People from Burnaby Category:Sportspeople from British Columbia
title: Christine Sinclair
